trans-unit.source: Flush DeepL caches
Clear all cached translations fetched by DeepL
Clear all cached translations fetched by DeepL on this page
DeepL cache
Successfully cleared DeepL cache
Something went wrong clearing the DeepL cache
(default/fallback) Source Language
The source language DeepL will use to translate from. Can be disabled for each language. See languages.
(default/fallback) Allowed targets
Only this languages will be offered for translation. Can be changed for each language. See languages.
Hreflang
Add all allowed languages as alternate links. (clear the page cache to make this change take effect!)
Exclude Elements
Exclude HTML elements from translation by CSS3 Selector (comma-separated!)
Split content

DeepL has a content-length limit per translation request so we need to split our html into parts. Specify parts of your HTML by a comma-separated list of CSS3 selectors which can be translated separately. e.g. "#page-header,#page-content,#page-footer"
Replace links
Add the language param "deepl" to all links?
Skip links with these attributes (comma-separated!)
Translated by machine placeholder
You have the following placeholder: {source}, {target}, {originalLink}
Target for the Translated by machine placeholder
Please specify an html element with an ID
Translate the Translated by machine placeholder
Recaptcha Protection
Use recaptcha verification to allow access to translated content.
Recaptcha Verify Page
Use this site to redirect the user to verify their access vie recaptcha.
